Uses of Class
scotty.database.Database

  • Packages that use Database 
    Package Description
    scotty.database
    This package contains the data model database related code for Scotty.
    scotty.database.parser
    This package contains the parsing and internal code for the Scotty database.
    scotty.template
    This package contains the template related code for Scotty.

      Parse a collection of streams open to Type data to create a Database.

      Parse a collection of files containing Type data to create a Database.
